full_summary:
### Parks Canada Reservation Service (PCRSv3) ITQ Notification

**Announcement Reference**
* English: PW-22-01011866
* French: (Numéro de référence)
* Amendment number: 0
* Solicitation number: WS3591211515
* Publication date: 2022-10-31
* Tender closing date and time: December 30, 2022, 14:00 hours EST

**Tender Notice Information**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has issued a Notification announcing the selection of qualified suppliers for the Parks Canada Reservation Service (PCRSv3). The purpose of this Notification is to inform the public that the following suppliers have met the mandatory requirements detailed in the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) and are therefore eligible to participate in the subsequent phases of the procurement process:

* RA Outdoors Ltd. d.b.a. Aspira
* Bookeasy Pty Ltd.
* Camis Inc.
* RMS North America, LLC

Only the above-mentioned suppliers will be invited to bid on any future solicitation issued as part of the procurement process.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

The procurement is also open to suppliers from Canada.

**Points of Contact**

Please address all inquiries to:

Huajun LI
huajun.li@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
8196612854

Note: This is a Notification only and does not have a solicitation document associated with it. Suppliers who are interested in participating in the procurement process should review the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) and related documents.illary footeuSincerely,
Huajun LI, Acquisition Officer. - جه " &, IN.
